title: Celebrate the Year of the Horse With This 2026 Lunar New Year Barbie: Shop It Here
summary: The doll is dressed elegantly in red and gold and comes in a decorative collectible box.
body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. What better way to ring in the new year than by buying Mattel’s 2026 Lunar New Year Barbie doll? With the Year of the Horse kicking off Feb. 17, toy company Mattel is ready to start celebrating. This fashion doll is available to preorder right now on Amazon and retails for $55 . The collectible won’t arrive at your doorstep until February, and is set to officially release to on Jan. 30 . That’s totally enough time, given Lunar New Year’s mid-February start. The decorative doll is clad in a rich red gown with a pleated peplum bodice and a blossoming golden peony print all down the skirt. Peony florals symbolize prosperity, honor and elegance, and offer a welcome for fresh beginnings, a great mantra to have as we head into 2026. A glittering sheer gold shawl is tossed over Barbie’s shoulders, fanning out and around her floor-length dress. As for accessories, the Barbie is clad in matching golden peony earrings to represen…
